description: Mural is a digital whiteboard platform enabling distributed teams to visually brainstorm, map ideas, and collaborate in real time with sticky notes and diagrams

capabilities.name: MURAL_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST
capabilities.description: Tool to initiate the OAuth 2.0 authorization process. Use when you need to redirect a user to Mural to obtain an authorization code.

capabilities.name: MURAL_CREATE_STICKY_NOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to create one or more sticky note widgets on a mural. Use when you need to add notes to a mural layout.

capabilities.name: MURAL_GET_CURRENT_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve information about the currently authenticated user. Use when you need current user details after authentication.

capabilities.name: MURAL_GET_FILES_FOR_MURAL
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of file widgets in a mural. Use after confirming the mural ID when listing file attachments.

capabilities.name: MURAL_GET_MURAL_WIDGETS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all widgets within a specified mural. Use after confirming the mural ID is correct.
